title: Players vs. Fuckboys ft. Nick Viall
description:
Nick Viall, ABC’s “The Bachelor” alumni and host of the Viall Files podcast, joins Lauren and Jeremy to talk players, f*ckboys and everything in between. Nick explains the importance of communication within the social dynamics of dating, hooking up and relationships.
Listen to the Viall Files: https://viallfiles.com/

Use our offer code WT9 to get a 60-day free trial—go to https://ShipStation.com, click on the microphone at the top, and enter code WT9.
Go check out https://AdamAndEve.com today, select one item and get 50% off including FREE shipping when you enter offer code WILDTIL9.
Head to https://YourParade.com/WILD and use code WILD to get twenty percent off your first order.
